name: Hangry Bunnies From Mars
description: Face off against an invading horde of adorable little killers with a serious case of mankind munchies! Join the Critter Death Squad and arm yourself to the teeth with epic transforming weapons that will help you fight to keep New Los Angeles off the dinner menu!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or Radeon RX470 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: If playing on a lower-end VR system, make sure to change the quality settings to a lower option if you experience the game running in "slow motion".
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
